title: Person of Interest - Behind The Scenes
author: CBS
comment: This is an excellent program on all levels, the entire cast and crew has delivered a quality product in 'Person of Interest' that has only gotten better with each episode.  Please keep them coming!
@theRecONcile Agreed.  Michael Emerson is awesome.  Can't wait for tomorrow!  :)
description: Executive Producer, Greg Plageman, discusses what to look forward to on the new CBS drama, Person of Interest. Don't miss the Person of Interest season premiere Thursday, September 22 at 9/8c. Only on CBS!
